body: These foot-long arrows are used as ammunition for arrow tubes. As an improvised melee weapon, they deal damage equivalent to a spiked gauntlet. They come in a bamboo tube that holds 10 shafts.
name: Bamboo Shaft Arrow
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Eastern Armor and Weapons/Eastern Weapons/Weapon Descriptions/Bamboo Shaft Arrow
